Our family's #Passover #seder plate, which contains the various symbolic festive foods, was my late Auntie Ruth's. We've been using it every year since I was born. It's not just beautiful, it also reminds me of her. (And I've written about it here - https://t.co/OnUwSflb7k) https://t.co/O3Hgfu8Lgi
